tasks.test: deno task test-gen && deno task test-bg
tasks.test-sf: deno task start-browser & BROWSER_PID=$! && sleep 10 && deno test --no-check --parallel  --import=tests/mocks.ts -A ./tests/salesforce/*.test.ts
tasks.locales: deno task locale-check && deno task sort
tasks.dev-firefox: deno --allow-write manifest/build-manifest.mjs firefox && deno task bundle
tasks.dev-chrome: deno --allow-write manifest/build-manifest.mjs chrome && deno task bundle
tasks.dev-edge: deno --allow-write manifest/build-manifest.mjs edge && deno task bundle
tasks.dev-safari: deno --allow-write manifest/build-manifest.mjs safari && deno task bundle
tasks.build-firefox: deno task dev-firefox && bash bin/zip-extension.bash firefox
tasks.build-chrome: deno task dev-chrome && bash bin/zip-extension.bash chrome
tasks.build-edge: deno task dev-edge && bash bin/zip-extension.bash edge
tasks.build-safari: deno task dev-safari && bash bin/zip-extension.bash safari && bash bin/convert-to-safari-app-extension.bash
